ids_alerts.rule_msg: FILE-IMAGE Apple PICT Quickdraw image converter packType 4 buffer overflow attempt
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $FILE_DATA_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"FILE-IMAGE Apple PICT Quickdraw image converter packType 4 buffer overflow attempt"; flow:to_client,established; file_data; content:"|00 9A 00 9F 00 A4 00 A9 00 AE 00 B2 00 B7 00 BC 00 C1 00 C6 00 CB 00 D0 00 D5 00 DB 00 E0 00 E5|",fast_pattern,nocase; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:ftp-data,http,imap,pop3; reference:bugtraq,30597; reference:bugtraq,30598; reference:cve,2008-3018; reference:cve,2008-3021; classtype:attempted-user; sid:44455; rev:2; )

ids_alerts.rule_msg: MALWARE-OTHER Img.Trojan.Xbash variant PNG file with an embedded Windows executable
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $FILE_DATA_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"MALWARE-OTHER Img.Trojan.Xbash variant PNG file with an embedded Windows executable"; flow:to_client,established; flowbits:isset,file.png; file_data; content:"TVqQAAMAAAAEAAAA//8AALgAAAAAAAAAQAAAAAA",fast_pattern,nocase; metadata:impact_flag red,policy balanced-ips drop,policy max-detect-ips drop,policy security-ips drop; service:ftp-data,http,imap,pop3; reference:url,www.virustotal.com/#/file/d7fbd2a4db44d86b4cf5fa4202203dacfefd6ffca6a0615dca5bc2a200ad56b6/detection; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:47869; rev:1; )

alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $FILE_DATA_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"INDICATOR-SHELLCODE ASCII heapspray characters detected"; flow:to_client,established; file_data; content:"0d0d0d0d",fast_pattern,nocase; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:ftp-data,http,imap,pop3; reference:url,sf-freedom.blogspot.com/2006/07/heap-spraying-internet-exploiter.html; classtype:attempted-user; sid:33339; rev:2; )

alert ip $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"INDICATOR-SHELLCODE x86 inc ebx NOOP"; content:"CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC"; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; classtype:shellcode-detect; sid:1390; rev:17; )

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to *.duckdns. Domain
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to *.duckdns. Domain"; dns.query; content:".duckdns."; nocase; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2022918; rev:4; metadata:created_at 2016_06_27, confidence Medium, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_11_30, reviewed_at 2024_04_16;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to a *.duckdns .org Domain
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to a *.duckdns .org Domain"; dns.query; content:".duckdns.org"; fast_pattern; nocase; endswith; reference:url,changeip.com; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2042936; rev:2; metadata:attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2022_12_15, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_03_02, mitre_tactic_id TA0011, mitre_tactic_name Command_And_Control, mitre_technique_id T1568, mitre_technique_name Dynamic_Resolution;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS HTTP Request to a *.duckdns .org Domain
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS HTTP Request to a *.duckdns .org Domain"; flow:established,to_server; http.host; content:".duckdns.org"; endswith; reference:url,raw.githubusercontent.com/MISP/misp-warninglists/main/lists/dynamic-dns/list.json; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2042937; rev:2; metadata:attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2022_12_15, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_03_02, mitre_tactic_id TA0011, mitre_tactic_name Command_And_Control, mitre_technique_id T1568, mitre_technique_name Dynamic_Resolution;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Windows executable base64 encoded
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Windows executable base64 encoded"; flow: established,from_server; file_data; content:"TVqQA"; pcre:"/^[A-Za-z0-9]{3}(?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{4}|\s){100}/Rs"; pcre:"/[^A-Za-z0-9+/]TVqQA/"; reference:md5,49aca228674651cba776be727bdb7e60; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2018856; rev:12; metadata:created_at 2014_07_31, confidence High, signature_severity Minor, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2020_08_19;)

ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET ATTACK_RESPONSE ReverseLoader Base64 Encoded Executable In Image M2"; flow:established,to_client; content:"BaseStart-TVqQA"; reference:md5,156acbdb4695299da30c44fd22e7f62d; reference:md5,e47853c751b49b792e7d27998eb7e3d6; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2065092; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state TLSDecrypt, created_at 2025_08_12, deployment Perimeter, deployment SSLDecrypt, malware_family ReverseLoader, confidence Medium, signature_severity Major, updated_at 2025_10_08, former_sid 2864236, mitre_tactic_id TA0011, mitre_tactic_name Command_And_Control, mitre_technique_id T1105, mitre_technique_name Ingress_Tool_Transfer; target:dest_ip;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET JA3 Hash - Remcos 3.x/4.x TLS Connection
ids_alerts.rule_category: Malware Command and Control Activity Detected
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET JA3 Hash - Remcos 3.x/4.x TLS Connection"; flow:established,to_server; ja3.hash; content:"a85be79f7b569f1df5e6087b69deb493"; classtype:command-and-control; sid:2036594; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_04_19, deployment Perimeter, malware_family Remcos, confidence High, signature_severity Major, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2023_10_19;)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects instances of svchost.exe running with an unusual or uncommon command line parameter by excluding known legitimate or common patterns.
This could point at a file masquerading as svchost, a process injection, or hollowing of a legitimate svchost instance.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Msbuild Execution By Uncommon Parent Process
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious execution of 'Msbuild.exe' by a uncommon parent process
Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.
